The Haircut

This is a tower-defense like game about getting a haircut.

You open a hairdresser's shop in the middle of nowhere, were everyone needs a haircut. Per hairdresser's shop ONLY ONE guy at the time can get a haircut. Your task is to get everyones hair cut (of course not really, because the game is an Endless Runner). If you successfully do haircuts you will be rewarded with coins so you can build more hairdresser's shops. If a hairdresser's shop is occupied and someone else tries to get in: one of your hearts (=lives) gets removed. If you have no hearts left the game is over.
